Package pl.kuziow.genderdetector.controller

Class QueryController

java.lang.Object
pl.kuziow.genderdetector.controller.QueryController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/query")
public class QueryController
extends java.lang.Object
RestController class which sets out 2 endpoints Controller is available under address /gender-detector/query

  • Method Details

    • getName

      @GetMapping(path="/name", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public Response getName​(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="") java.lang.String variant, @RequestParam java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      variant - - defines whether method is going to analise only first part of the name String (value: ONE) or the whole String (any other value or nothing), this parameter is not required
      name - - name String to be analysed, it could consist of one name like "Anna" or multiple name like "Anna Maria Jan"
      Returns:
      3 possible Responses: Male, Female or Inconclusive if the algorithm is unable to specify gender

      This method works only on Polish names from PESEL database. It is worth mentioning that some some male names like Max, Jan or Zbigniew also occur in the female database and vice versa. This method is available under the endpoint http://localhost:8080/gender-detector/query/name?variant={one OR other value}&name={nameString}

    • getListOfNames

      @GetMapping(path="/gender", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getListOfNames​(@RequestParam java.lang.String gender, @RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="limit",defaultValue="25") int limit)
      Parameters:
      gender - - male or female.
      page - - which page of the results (default is 0)
      limit - - how many results of one page (default is 25)
      Returns:
      List of names

      This method returns the list of names for gender. Because the list is very big the result is paginated. This method is available under the endpoint: http://localhost:8080/gender-detector/query/gender?gender=&page=&limit=
